TEXT: An augmented True Kin from the Ice-Sheathed Arcology of Ibul. NL The ritual of transformation never ends.
NL You apply an injector and ready your arms...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~augmented~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
